alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 9:23AM CDT until June 12 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sangamon County in central Illinois... Southeastern Morgan County in west central Illinois... * Until 1000 AM CDT. * At 923 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woodson, or 8 miles southeast of Jacksonville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Franklin around 930 AM CDT. Waverly around 940 AM CDT. Auburn around 1000 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Nortonville and Lowder. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
